title: Escaping the Prison

thumbnailDetails.alt: Henry Stickmin Escaping the Prison Play Online

headings.text: How to Play Escaping the Prison

controls: Mouse: Click to select choices and interact with items.
content.howToPlay:
Henry Stickmin has found himself stuck in jail, and things aren't looking good. Suddenly, police officers Dave Panpa and Rupert Price show up with a mysterious package. Rupert, confident and a bit mean, mocks Henry, saying there's no way the package can help him escape. Dave, the nervous officer, admits he might not have thoroughly checked the package, meaning Henry might have a chance after all! Inside the package is a cake. But not just any cake—this one has hidden tools inside! Your job is to:

Click on an item inside the cake, like a nail file, teleporter, rocket launcher, or energy drink.Watch the funny cutscenes and outcomes.If your choice doesn't work out, no worries! Just click retry and try another way.Find multiple endings: escape quietly, break out loudly, or even get found not guilty in court!Try every option at least once, failing is part of the game!Remember your choices, so you don't repeat the same mistakes.Explore all endings for the full experience and unlock special moments.
content.developer: Henry Stickmin: Escaping the Prison was developed by PuffballsUnited, the creator of the popular Henry Stickmin game series.

fullContent: Home› FunnyEscaping the PrisonBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenHenry Stickmin: Escaping the Prison is a funny interactive free game where you help Henry Stickmin, a criminal stickman, escape from the West Mesa Prison. After breaking the bank by disguising it as a money bag and getting caught by security lasers in the bank's vault, Henry was sent to West Mesa Penitentiary. Now he's miserable, and since he was born a criminal, he's looking for ways to escape from this hell. It's up to you to guide him through his great escape, or watch him hilariously fail trying. This popular flash game is packed with funny moments, animations, surprising twists, and lots of replayability. Have fun escaping!ControlsMouse: Click to select choices and interact with items.How to Play Escaping the PrisonHenry Stickmin has found himself stuck in jail, and things aren't looking good. Suddenly, police officers Dave Panpa and Rupert Price show up with a mysterious package. Rupert, confident and a bit mean, mocks Henry, saying there's no way the package can help him escape. Dave, the nervous officer, admits he might not have thoroughly checked the package, meaning Henry might have a chance after all! Inside the package is a cake. But not just any cake—this one has hidden tools inside! Your job is to:Click on an item inside the cake, like a nail file, teleporter, rocket launcher, or energy drink.Watch the funny cutscenes and outcomes.If your choice doesn't work out, no worries! Just click retry and try another way.Find multiple endings: escape quietly, break out loudly, or even get found not guilty in court!Try every option at least once, failing is part of the game!Remember your choices, so you don't repeat the same mistakes.Explore all endings for the full experience and unlock special moments.FeaturesMultiple Endings: Try different ways to break out from prison, including sneaky escapes, bold breakouts, and legal twists.Funny Epic Fails: Even when Henry doesn't escape, the game's humorous animations make failing entertaining.One-Handed Play: Simple mouse-click controls make it perfect for players of all ages.DeveloperHenry Stickmin: Escaping the Prison was developed by PuffballsUnited, the creator of the popular Henry Stickmin game series.Henry Stickmin GamesIf you enjoy the fun choices and humorous outcomes in Henry Stickmin: Escaping the Prison, you'll love other games in the series like Stealing the Diamond and Fleeing the Complex.This article was updated on March 12, 20251 Player2DCrashCrazyDestroyFlashFreeFunFunnyStickman
